title: Divergent
synopsis: Divergent adalah film fiksi ilmiah Amerika tahun 2014 yang berdasarkan novel yang berjudul sama karya Veronica Roth.

title: Inception
synopsis: Inception adalah film fiksi ilmiah aksi-petualangan Amerika Serikat tahun 2010 yang disutradarai oleh Christopher Nolan.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: The Matrix adalah film aksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 1999 yang disutradarai oleh Wachowskis.

title: Jurassic Park
synopsis: Jurassic Park adalah film petualangan fiksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 1993 yang disutradarai oleh Steven Spielberg.

title: Avatar
synopsis: Avatar adalah film fiksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 2009 yang ditulis dan disutradarai oleh James Cameron.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: Spider-Man: No Way Home adalah film pahlawan super Amerika Serikat berdasarkan karakter Marvel Comics, Spider-Man, yang diproduksi bersama oleh Marvel Studios, Columbia Pictures dan Pascal Pictures, dan didistribusikan oleh Sony Pictures Releasing.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: Interstellar adalah film petualangan fiksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 2014 yang disutradarai oleh Christopher Nolan.

title: The Martian
synopsis: The Martian adalah film drama fiksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 2015 yang disutradarai oleh Ridley Scott.

title: Gravity
synopsis: Gravity adalah film thriller fiksi ilmiah Amerika Serikat tahun 2013 yang disutradarai oleh Alfonso Cuar√≥n.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
synopsis: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial adalah film fiksi ilmiah fantasi Amerika Serikat tahun 1982 yang disutradarai oleh Steven Spielberg.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
synopsis: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope adalah film opera ruang angkasa Amerika Serikat tahun 1977 yang disutradarai oleh George Lucas.

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: Forrest Gump is a 1994 comedy-drama film directed by Robert Zemeckis. It follows the life of Forrest Gump, a man with low intelligence, who unintentionally influences several historical events in the 20th century United States.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 neo-noir crime film directed by Quentin Tarantino. The film weaves multiple interconnected stories involving crime, redemption, and the bizarre occurrences in the lives of two hitmen.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 drama film directed by Frank Darabont. It tells the story of a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for a crime he didn't commit and his friendship with a fellow inmate.

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: The Dark Knight is a 2008 superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan. It is the second installment of Nolan's Batman trilogy and features the iconic character Batman and his battle against the Joker.

title: Gladiator
synopsis: Gladiator is a 2000 historical drama film directed by Ridley Scott. The story follows a former Roman general seeking vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Godfather
synopsis: The Godfather is a 1972 crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola. It is based on the novel by Mario Puzo and follows the powerful Italian-American Mafia family of Don Vito Corleone.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: The Fellowship of the Ring is a 2001 epic fantasy film directed by Peter Jackson. It's the first part of the Lord of the Rings trilogy and follows the journey of a young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, who must destroy a powerful ring to save Middle-earth.

title: Schindler's List
synopsis: Schindler's List is a 1993 historical drama film directed by Steven Spielberg. The film tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of more than a thousand Polish-Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

title: Titanic
synopsis: Titanic is a 1997 epic romance and disaster film directed by James Cameron. The film revolves around the ill-fated maiden voyage of the RMS Titanic and the love story between Jack and Rose.
